items.sentence: Tom and Mary announced their engagement to their families.
Tom and Mary both had no idea what John was talking about.
I suspect that Tom and Mary have never done that together.
You want me to get a better job, but I don\'t think I can.
You\'ll be in charge of the women working in this factory.
A friend of mine is looking for someone who speaks French.
As far as I know, Tom has never attempted to kill himself.
Tom assumed Mary would like the present he bought for her.
Do you expect me to believe you did this without any help?
Do you think Tom is strong enough to lift that by himself?
How long have Tom and Mary been going out with each other?
Tom didn\'t tell anyone that he\'d seen Mary kissing John.
I doubt that Tom has the courage to cross the picket line.
I doubt that Tom would help, but you should still ask him.
I dropped by the bookstore and bought an interesting book.
Tom pointed out several grammar mistakes on Mary\'s essay.
Tom made a reservation for three days at the Hilton Hotel.
Tom made no attempt to convince Mary that he was innocent.
Tom managed a small bar near Boston for quite a few years.
Tom managed a small bar near Boston for quite a long time.
